page.description: Gets the names of all groups that a user is a member of. Returns a crlf delimited list.
page.syntax: Group_List as C = a5_get_user_assignments(C master_password ,C user_name )

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

page.discussion: The A5_GET_USER_ASSIGNMENTS() function allows the Administrator to retrieve a CR-LF delimited list of groups to which a user is assigned.
